I think Lindsey ruined her career long before she showed up in South Korea.  When you use the Olympics as a platform to spew your disgusting hate, you are trashing sportsmanship, yourself, and the election process of this great country.  You claim to be patriotic. We don't need your brand of patriotism. The United States Military, all branches, voted overwhelmingly for Donald Trump.  The Christian vote was also overwhelmingly for Donald Trump.  If you hate our election process so bad, go somewhere else.  I realize you are spoiled and are used to having your way, but America needed a leader and we got one! We, the unemployed, the suffering and struggling families needed someone to bring back jobs, boost the economy, lower taxes, fix immigration, fix health care and hear the voice of the people. We did not need the treasonous, lying, scandal ridden, corrupt, baby killing and complete failure of Hillary Clinton. Can you name 1 accomplishment she registered in 30 years of political life? Just one????  I know, you wanted her to win because she was a woman.  Thank God that our country has people with more sense than you.  In a little more than a year, Trump brought back thousands of jobs, good jobs from foreign countries.  He prevented thousands more from leaving. He has the economy soaring, wages are up, taxes are down, immigration is under control, health care is being fixed, and Trump has accomplished all this in a little over a year with liberals trying to interfere every step of the way. BUT YOU WANTED HILLARY BECAUSE YOU DO NOT GIVE A DAMN ABOUT THE PEOPLE IN THIS COUNTRY THAT ARE SUFFERING!
You are a sucker for the George Soros propaganda networks of NBC, CBS, ABC and CNN. If you had any clue of how much damage Hillary would have caused in the country you.... well you probably wouldn't have cared because you just want a woman president. Why not get behind a woman of substance, honor, and decency? Hillary is none of those. Do you support the "me too" movement? Do you remember the 29 women that came forward with sexual harassment claims against Bill Clinton that Hillary called "liars" and threatened them, and bought some of them off?  Do you remember travelgate and the horrible lies she used to smear the 30 year Travel Office Director Billy Dale so she could hire her buddies!  The courts found that Hillary totally lied.  How about her pay to play politics that made her a multi millionaire while she sold out her country to Russia. How about the blood bath she left in Benghazi and the lies she fed Americans to hide her incompetence. How about her disregard for our national security by having an illegal private server with classified documents exposed for the world to see.  Or her destruction of her hard drives which is also a felony. Or lying to the FBI about having 11 devices that all contained classified information (another felony).  She abused her power as secretary of state in so many ways, mostly to line her own pockets, that it is clear even the FBI is afraid to do anything to stop her. But you still think we should have elected her because she is a woman?   Maybe you should stick to downhill skiing... or maybe not. You owe Trump an apology but spoiled brats don't do that sort of thing now do they?  If you do get invited to the white house, I hope you stay home, because there will be a lot of honorable Americans there that do care and are not so disrespectful.

For that little infraction, a select group of so called "Americans" cheered on her loss. Because in the end, it really isn't about seeing America's team win, it's about politics, yet again.
